StringVectorProperty.name: AaaFileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Reads in points from a Ramses binary file.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which point attributes to read.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ParticleMassGuess
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: If this run includes hydro, it is necessary to have a guess at the gas particle mass. If this is a cosmo run, a decent guess for the guess particle mass can be automatically determined from the total mass, the minimum dark matter particle mass, and omegab/(omegam-omegab). If another guess is desired (required in the case of a non-cosmo run) please specify a non-zero positive value here.

IntVectorProperty.name: HasParticleData
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If the file you are reading has no particle data, uncheck this option otherwise a crash will occur
